thread.title: PRIVATE VIDEO: Puri Jagannadh, Ram Gopal Varma Enjoying Belly Dance At Puri Birthday Party
thread.title_full: PRIVATE VIDEO: Puri Jagannadh, Ram Gopal Varma Enjoying Belly Dance At Puri Birthday Party

title: PRIVATE VIDEO: Puri Jagannadh, Ram Gopal Varma Enjoying Belly Dance At Puri Birthday Party
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
It is known that Puri Jagannadh has arranged a lavish birthday party on the eve of his 49th birthday to his close friends from the industry. Puri usually jell along with his own set of friends and he chose to celebrate his birthday also only with them. 
In addition, he invited few of the journalists from media to be part of the special party. Many of them even took to twitter to inform that they had great fun at the event. 
Apparently, a leaked video from the party is now going viral on the social networking websites, drawing many eye balls. Ram Gopal Varma was spotted in the video, enjoying the moves of specially arranged belly dancers while smoking a puff and having a drink. 
This video led to many controversies as it is too private to be made public and a channel was screwed for actually airing it on TV. 
The video aired by the TV channel was immediately taken down from their official You-Tube channel. Nevertheless, the video did not stop spreading on the internet. 
Video Courtesy: Sakshi TV
